title: RADS ERROR *HELP*
body: I try to open lol and says me that rads error and i dont know what to do i disabled my firewall and it does it again pls help me to fix it. Ty.

replies.body: Try right clicking on the LoL shortcut and select to run as administrator.

Got the same problem here, tried to uninstall and reinstall my game yet when the download is finish and I try to open the game to eventually get all the patches etc... it just doesn't open and says : PVP.net Patcher Kernel stopped working.

Well I managed to fix it by playing the game in compatibilty mode with Windows 8 instead of Windows 7, it also works if you put it in compatibilty mode with Windows Vista, I have no idea why the client isn't running in compatibility mode with Windows 7.
